text: The MAV-1 (Maneuvering Air Vehicle) is a low observable Unmanned Air Vehicle prototype developed between ST Aerospace and Defence Science and Technology Agency for its swarming unmanned air vehicle research programme. The prototype was unveiled in Asian Aerospace 2004 and the first test flight was reported in 2005. ==References== *ST Aero presses on with MAV-1, 28 Feb 2006 Category:Unmanned aerial vehicles of Singapore Category:Military robots Category:Military equipment of Singapore MAV-1
title: ST Aero MAV-1
